text: Le Vignon-en-Quercy is a commune in the Lot department in south-western France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Les Quatre-Routes-du-Lot (the seat) and Cazillac.Arrêté préfectoral 14 December 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Lot department ==References== Category:Communes of Lot (department)
title: Le Vignon-en-Quercy
